messages.content: ComfyUI_TiledKSampler is a tiled sampler for ComfyUI that allows denoising larger images by splitting them into smaller tiles and denoising these tiles while minimizing seams in the end result.
How does ComfyUI_TiledKSampler minimize seams in the final image?
ComfyUI_TiledKSampler minimizes seams by gradually denoising all tiles one step at a time and randomizing tile positions for every step.
What are the additional settings available in ComfyUI_TiledKSampler?
The additional settings in ComfyUI_TiledKSampler include tile_width, tile_height, and tiling_strategy.
Which tiling strategy is best for hiding seams in images?
The random tiling strategy is exceptionally good at hiding seams in images, even when starting from complete noise.
What is the downside of the random tiling strategy?
The downside of the random tiling strategy is that it can unfavorably crop border tiles.
Which tiling strategy is compatible with uni samplers and has no overhead between steps?
The padded tiling strategy is compatible with uni samplers and has no overhead between steps.
What features are included in the ComfyUI_TiledKSampler roadmap?
The ComfyUI_TiledKSampler roadmap includes features such as latent masks, image-wide control nets, T2I adaptors, area conditioning, area mask conditioning, and GLIGEN.
